definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: After we greeted, we went to play basketball in Liwan Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 在我們迎接，我們去荔灣體育館打籃球。

sentences.english: The money collected was used to build a statue of Zeus at the entrance to the stadium .
sentences.chinese: 在體育館入口處，人們用這些罰款建造一尊宙斯像。

sentences.english: Finally, the ref physically threw him out of the building.
sentences.chinese: 最後，裁判把他擡出了體育館。

sentences.english: Large-span suspended-dome was adopted in Ji nan Olympic Center Gymnasium.
sentences.chinese: 濟南奧體中心體育館採用大跨度弦支穹頂結構。

sentences.english: A gymnasium was added to the indoor stadium.
sentences.chinese: 在室內體育館裏爲學生增建健身室。

sentences.english: They may also exercise in the gym .
sentences.chinese: 也可以在體育館裏做操。

sentences.english: Located opposite the Workers' Stadium, between Dongzhimen and Gongtibei Road.
sentences.chinese: 位於工人體育館的對面，在東直們和工體北路之間。

sentences.english: Many are staying in gymnasiums and community centers.
sentences.chinese: 許多人還住在體育館和社區中心。

sentences.english: Bemo-roof system is used as roof boarding of Huanglong Gymnasium in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省黃龍體育館的屋面板採用貝姆屋面系統。

sentences.english: En route to the university , we saw a tail-gate party near the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 去大學的途中，我們看到在體育館邊有個車後集會。

sentences.english: Did you watch the football game in Wutaishan stadium last night ?
sentences.chinese: 你昨晚去五臺山體育館看足球賽了嗎？

sentences.english: They are playing basketball either on the playground or in the gym .
sentences.chinese: 他們要麼正在操場上或者在體育館裏打籃球。

sentences.english: A week ago, the Bird's Nest had got its opening.
sentences.chinese: 一個星期以前，“鳥巢”體育館開館。

sentences.english: The next morning, he went to the gym to practise.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，他到體育館練球。

sentences.english: The game will be staged in the gymnasium.
Well, right now, we practice a lot at the City Rock Gym which is really close.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我們經常在附近的城市之石體育館練習。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
